text: Marinus Cornelis "Marco" Minnaard (born 11 April 1989 in Wemeldinge) is a Dutch former professional cyclist, who rode professionally between 2012 and 2019 for the and teams. In June 2017, he was named in the startlist for the Tour de France. ==Major results== ;2012 : 3rd Kattekoers : 9th Overall Tour of China I : 9th Ronde van Midden-Nederland : 10th Grand Prix Pino Cerami ;2014 : 1st 20px Mountains classification La Tropicale Amissa Bongo : 4th Tour de Vendée ;2016 : 7th Overall Tour of Norway : 10th Overall Tour of Austria ;2017 : 1st 20px Overall Rhône-Alpes Isère Tour ::1st 20px Points classification : 1st 20px Sprints classification Vuelta a Andalucía : 9th Overall Tour du Limousin ;2019 : 1st 20px Mountains classification Tour Poitou-Charentes en Nouvelle-Aquitaine : 9th Overall Rhône-Alpes Isère Tour ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2017 ! scope="col" | 2018 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |40 |64 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |— |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male cyclists Category:People from Kapelle Category:Sportspeople from Zeeland Category:Tour de France cyclists
